knimeNode.name: FSK Editor JS
knimeNode.shortDescription: Java Script Editor of FSK objects

fullDescription.intro:
Edit the scripts in an FSK object: model, parameters and visualization scripts. In case there is no input model connected then it will create a new model from the user interface.
When a new model is typed in a default simulation called defaultSimulation will be created with the variables defined in the parameter script.
fullDescription.option: README file (optional). if the input FSK object has README already set then this field will not be available for edit, but the text of the README can be changed using the JS view KNIME-URL like "knime://knime.workflow/" is accepted

Directory with resource files used by the model: plaintext, CSV and R workspaces (optional). If the working Directory is not exist then it will be created First in the workflow folder in Knime workspace. KNIME-URL like "knime://knime.workflow/" is accepted

List of resource Files used by this model (optional).. All chosen Files will be added automatically to the working directory! If the working Directory is not exist then it will be created First in the workflow folder in Knime workspace.

knimeNode.interactiveView: JavaScript view to edit FSK object.
